greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Generalized Catalan numbers C(-2; n).
comment: See triangle A064334 with columns m built from C(-m; n), m >= 0, also for Derrida et al. references.
formula: G.f.: (1+2*x*c(-2*x)/3)/(1-x/3) = 1/(1-x*c(-2*x)) with c(x) g.f. of Catalan numbers A000108.
a(n) = hypergeom([1-n, n], [-n], -2) for n>0. - _Peter Luschny_, Nov 30 2014
program: a = lambda n: mpmath.hyp2f1(1-n, n, -n, -2) if n>0 else 1
[int(a(n)) for n in range(21)] # _Peter Luschny_, Nov 30 2014
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Sep 21 2001
